mapper.select: SELECT u.MANAGER_YN as managerYN, o.DEPARTMENT_NAME as raterDepartmentName, u.EMPLOYEE_NAME as raterName FROM user_info u, organization_chart o WHERE u.EMAIL = #{email} AND u.PASSWORD = #{password} and u.DEPARTMENT_ID = o.DEPARTMENT_ID

SELECT S.SURVEY_SEQ, S.SURVEY_NAME, S.SURVEY_CONTENT, M.RATER_ID, UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS RATER_NAME, GR.GRADE_NAME AS RATER_GRADE_NAME, OCR.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS RATER_DEPARTMENT_NAME, M.APPRAISEE_ID, UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS APPRAISEE_NAME, GA.GRADE_NAME AS APPRAISEE_GRADE_NAME, OCA.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS APPRAISEE_DEPARTMENT_NAME, M.SURVEY_COMPLETE_YN, UR.EMAIL, UR.MANAGER_YN FROM USER_INFO UR , USER_INFO UA, SURVEY_LIST S, MAPPING M,GRADE GR, GRADE GA, ORGANIZATION_CHART OCR, ORGANIZATION_CHART OCA WHERE S.SURVEY_CLOSED_DATE >= SYSDATE-1 AND UR.EMPLOYEE_ID = M.RATER_ID AND UR.GRADE_ID = GR.GRADE_ID AND UR.DEPARTMENT_ID = OCR.DEPARTMENT_ID AND UA.EMPLOYEE_ID = M.APPRAISEE_ID AND UA.GRADE_ID = GA.GRADE_ID AND UA.DEPARTMENT_ID = OCA.DEPARTMENT_ID AND S.SURVEY_SEQ = M.SURVEY_SEQ AND <if test="surveySeq !=0"> S.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} AND </if> UR.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{raterId} ORDER BY S.SURVEY_SEQ </select>
<select id="getQuestion" parameterType="int" resultType="hashmap"> SELECT SURVEY_LIST.SURVEY_NAME ,SURVEY_QUESTION.SURVEY_SEQ ,SURVEY_QUESTION.QUESTION_SEQ ,SURVEY_QUESTION.QUESTION_CONTENT ,SURVEY_QUESTION.QUESTION_TYPE_CODE ,SURVEY_ITEM.ITEM_SEQ ,SURVEY_ITEM.ITEM_CONTENT ,SURVEY_ITEM.ITEM_SCORE FROM SURVEY_LIST,(SURVEY_ITEM right join SURVEY_QUESTION on SURVEY_ITEM.QUESTION_SEQ = SURVEY_QUESTION.QUESTION_SEQ) where SURVEY_QUESTION.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} and SURVEY_LIST.SURVEY_SEQ = ${surveySeq} ORDER BY SURVEY_QUESTION.QUESTION_SEQ ASC,SURVEY_ITEM.ITEM_SCORE ASC, SURVEY_ITEM.ITEM_SEQ </select>
<select id="getSurveySeqAndName" parameterType="string" resultType="hashmap"> <![CDATA[ SELECT DISTINCT M.SURVEY_SEQ ,SL.SURVEY_NAME ,SL.ANONYMITY_CHECK_CODE FROM SURVEY_LIST SL ,MAPPING M WHERE SL.SURVEY_SEQ = M.SURVEY_SEQ AND SL.SURVEY_START_DATE <= SYSDATE AND SL.SURVEY_CLOSED_DATE >= SYSDATE AND SL.STATE_CODE = '30004' AND M.RATER_ID = #{raterId} order by M.SURVEY_SEQ
SELECT COUNT(ANONYMITY_SEQ) FROM SURVEY_RESULT WHERE ANONYMITY_SEQ = #{nanSu}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SURVEY_RESULT (SURVEY_SEQ, RATER_ID, APPRAISEE_ID, ANONYMITY_SEQ, QUESTION_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, ANSWER_CONTENT, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES(#{surveySeq}, #{raterId}, #{appraiseeId}, #{anonymitySeq}, #{questionSeq}, #{itemSeq}, #{answerContent}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT ANONYMITY_CHECK_CODE ,SURVEY_NAME ,to_date(SURVEY_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as surveyStartDate ,to_date(SURVEY_CLOSED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-dd' ) as surveyClosedDate FROM SURVEY_LIST WHERE SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq}
